snippet: The rigid protocol in classical music whereby solo performers are expected to play from memory seems finally to be loosening its hold.
abstract: Rigid protocol in classical music whereby solo performers are expected to play from memory seems finally to be loosening its hold.
lead_paragraph: The rigid protocol in classical music whereby solo performers are expected to play from memory seems finally to be loosening its hold.

headline.seo: Memorization’s Loosening Hold on Concert Tradition
headline.main: Playing by Heart, With or Without a Score
headline.print_headline: Playing by Heart, With or Without a Score
